item.title: 'Captain Kate' rules the waves
item.description: Kate Middleton joined Britain's America's Cup hopefuls, Ben Ainslie Racing, for a training session on the Solent.
item.ExtractedText: 1 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session The Duchess of Cambridge is the patron of 1851 Trust, a charity set up by Ainslie's sailing team which provides nautical education for young people. Hide Caption 2 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session Middleton helped open the Trust's new education center in Portsmouth, in the south of England. The center -- called the "Tech Deck" -- features exhibitions on the science behind America's Cup engineering. Hide Caption 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session The Duchess then strapped herself in for a ride on Ainslie's 45-foot catamaran. Hide Caption 4 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session Ainslie was testing the yacht ahead of the Louis Vuitton America's Cup World Series in Portsmouth, in late July. The two-day racing event is a build-up for next year's America's Cup Challenger series Hide Caption 5 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session Middleton, a keen sailor, helped with the rigging while the yacht sliced through waves at around 38 mph (61 kilometers per hour). Hide Caption 6 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session The training session took place on the Solent, a strait of water separating mainland England from the Isle of Wight, and where the original America's Cup race set sail in 1851. Hide Caption 7 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session Ainslie launched his own multi-million dollar America's Cup bid in 2014, vowing to bring the trophy back to UK soil for the first time in 165 years. Hide Caption 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session Middleton has since been a high-profile patron of Ainslie's sailing team. "You can tell she has done a lot of sailing, she was a natural on board," said Ainslie of the Duchess. Hide Caption 9 of 10 10 photos: Kate Middleton joins Ben Ainslie Racing for a training session With Middleton on board, Ainslie has been testing one of his team's development yachts -- a foiling AC45 catamaran. Hide Caption
